message.body: How is your Saturday going?
Good. I'm taking it easy. I made tofu scramble and coffee. Then I replaced our bathroom window because the top half of the old one was missing.
What about you?
I'm taking it easy.
Too.
Pretty beat. I took yesterday off and didn't do anything. Except make this necklace from curtain string: ￼￼
How cool!!!
That's beautiful. I like the brass wire things on the clasp
So what are you doing while you're taking it easy today?
Cleaning house ;(
That can be fun. We're doing the opposite. Making a big mess
What you guys doing?
That makes a big mess.
It's so beautiful here
￼Installing this breakfast bar
Big mess!! Ha!
We'll be serving cosmopolitans and veggie dogs all summer.
I got your email with the picture of the cat. He's so cute. Is that your parents cat?
Yeah!! I know you like cats.
Cats are the best. How is your Sunday going?
Ok struggling with homework
I'm feeling kind of lame
Like I just don't think the people I know at massart like me as much as I like me. It's a weird feeling.
To not be appreciated
I'm surprised to hear that
Why?

I just don't get it. I love fun and good food and being arrogant and fun things, like makeup and clothes. But I also love hardworking and reading and being critical. But I also am a supportive friend and giving classmate. What am I missing? Am I not humble enough, maybe?
I just feel a little insecure, I'm so used to being appreciated.
I really thought I could get along with a types of people. Now, I just don't know.
I don't know. I think you're a really good friend. And you're fun.
Thanks. Have u ever been in that situation?

Yeah. I think you have to remember that a lot of people like things that suck. And sometimes people just aren't paying attention or being empathetic enough to notice the awesome things that other people have to offer
I think people here don't like me..don't think I'm smart. I don't understand.
Not in my program... The regular mfa kids... It's ironic
Cause I don't like them

I don't think you should worry too much about what they think. If you're making work that you're happy with I think that's more important. It sounds like a cliche but life is too short to worry about people who don't like you if you don't like them. There's enough people in the world that you can surround yourself with ones that you think are awesome
Yeah
That's whAt I try to do. But then I run into someone and I just wonder why they aren't as happy to see me as I am to see them.
What did you do last night
I hung out with Vinnie. We went to dahlak for a few beers then went and played music at our friend Greg's back porch. You?
Went out with my roommate and her friends and had delicious drinks in Cambridge.

Unfortunately one of the girls was a sour puss and was only happy if age was receiving male attention, which meant we all had to talk to lame boys. But it was really fun other than that. And we had a beautiful walk home.
What are you working on for your class?
Typography poster.
Typography terminology poster.
We will see how it goes. No ac in here. It's terrible
That sounds like a fun project
It is. It's cool. I like it. I just feel sad because I haven't been making time for painting.
I really need to make money quick.
Oh. That's too bad. But you'll have time to paint this summer. When are you going to Maine?
At the end of July for a week or two.
Then I think I might try to stay in my for a month.
That sounds awesome. I'm kind of jealous.
It should be. I'm going with Wendy
She's renting me a bike and leaving me alone.
I go to Beach, read and explore.
I'll try to be outside a lot.
Do I know Wendy?
It's good because, when I first moved to boston I was lonely and wanted friends and a boyfriend. Now I love my space and crave more of it. Yes,Wendy's my moms best friend and my mentor.
She is an artist. I link to her on my website.
That sounds perfect for you
Yeah. I think so.
I'm excited. I just don't understand why I am so antisocial.
I usually love being around people.
Basically what I'm saying is that I haven't meant awesome people at mass art and you should come to school here and be my friend.
We can go kayaking for $20/hr
I want to. School is still a question mark. But I'd like to come up to visit this summer
And redefine awesome in boston
Come!!!
Amelia got a $1 ticket!!
When I get the truck I can drive up
So many hours!!!!
Do u like long rides
Yeah but I can take my time. Maybe I'll visit my cousin in Brooklyn on the way. And camp somewhere in between
Oh cool
Yeah. That sounds good
Come now!!!!
I have to get the truck first. Maybe in a couple weeks
I should have the truck by the end of this week
Ok.
Did I tell you I started learning how to play klezmer music with my friends Cat and Andy?
No! Cool
It's really fun. It's totally different from anything else I've played. It's complicated and really challenging
Cooooool
I want to see your poster
Me too
Still sketching ideas
It's due Tuesday though
How is it coming?
Hard. I'm a little lost
Why? What's the assignment?
The assignment is to take typographic terms and make a poster. Pretty straight forward. I feel like in copying all the ones I've looked at. I'm trying to figure out how to make it my own.
Sorry. I fell asleep. Then I woke up and went to a dance performance. The dancers were hanging from wires off the strawberry mansion bridge over the schuykill river
Where's strawberry mansion bridge?
In fair mount park
Yeah. It goes over the bike path and the river.
It was cool. There was this really ethereal choral music and dancers in the grass in white clothes with white flowers on them
They looked like Amish zombies
Cool
Ha
I'm walking home. I feel like I works all day and I have so little to show
I should have gone kayaking
Ha. Did you figure out what you're going to do?
I just started doing
I'm not sure that's the best approach.
I feel like I didn't question enough
Maybe it's better than over thinking it and starting doing too late.
Yeah. That's what I figured. I just jumped in
I just wasn't sure how to sketch out my ideas
It's not conveying all the things you wanted it to?
What ideas?
Hey. Did you call me last night?
Pocket dial
I see. How is your morning? Back at work on the poster?
Nah working for school this morning. So tired. Do hot.
I heard that. It's like a gazillion degrees here
Oh man no fucking ac!!
You don't have ac either? I want to play hooky and go swimming.
Yes!!!! Beach
Or a creek with shady trees and rocks to jump off of
￼Well there it is. Without color.
It looks really good. Is that a quote from someone?
Yeah.
I like it
I lifted it.
Me too
But in the bottom I talk about the text versus the image.
What do you say about it?
What are you doing now? Are you still working?
I was walking home. I just hopped in the shower. I was filthy. We were on trash today.
And I wasn't strong enough to throw stuff into the dumpster so I would use my head and stuff to prop trash bags up high.
That sounds fun. Did you find anything good?
Yeah I got a ton of stuff but nothing amazing. The only thing I really need now is money for a new computer. And I did find a bAg of change but no quarters.
How was your day
Mostly frustrating. It was hot and the shop was really crowded so I spent a lot of time waiting for tools. But then I went and had a beer with my friend zack which was nice
Where was all the trash from?
Oh fun. Graduating grads.
Beereerrrrr
Someone told me once: you can take the kid out of west Philly, but you can't take the kid out of the dumpster.
I like that
I know, the girl I work with did not want to loot at all
I was like first things first: loot say
Loot away
I'm glad you think that way. It's a waste not to loot. What did you get?
